file_insights.changes_made: Replaced physical positioning properties with logical properties

key_modifications.rationale: Logical properties support bidirectional text layouts (LTR/RTL)
Logical value 'start' adapts to text direction, replacing physical 'left'

file_insights.impact: Improved internationalization support and RTL compatibility

key_modifications.description: Changed from single Roboto font to multiple fonts (Plus Jakarta Sans, Noto Sans Hebrew, Fira Code)

file_insights.impact: Branding refinement and improved typography support for Hebrew and code fonts

patterns_discovered.description: Systematic replacement of physical CSS properties (left/right) with logical equivalents (insetInlineStart/insetInlineEnd)
patterns_discovered.benefit: Enables automatic RTL/LTR text direction support

patterns_discovered.description: Converting text-align values from physical ('left') to logical ('start')
patterns_discovered.benefit: Maintains responsive design intent while supporting bidirectional layouts

patterns_discovered.description: Build process automatically updates script hashes and rebuilds with new dependencies

gotchas_discovered.description: Only replaced left/right in one specific Box component, not all positioning in the file
gotchas_discovered.potential_issue: May indicate selective migration strategy or incomplete refactoring across codebase
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Verify if migration strategy is scoped to specific components or needs expansion

gotchas_discovered.description: File still contains 'top' and 'bottom' (physical vertical properties) alongside new logical properties
gotchas_discovered.note: This is acceptable as vertical properties don't have logical equivalents for text direction

gotchas_discovered.description: Script hash changed from BcBCklOs to D-L1pwPQ, indicating full rebuild occurred
gotchas_discovered.potential_issue: May affect caching strategies and deployment if not properly versioned

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully migrated LoginPage component to use CSS logical properties for positioning and text alignment
approach_outcome.completion_efficiency: First attempt successful - no iterations needed

recommendations.description: Audit other pages and components for similar left/right/center text-align patterns that could be migrated to logical properties
recommendations.benefit: Consistent RTL/LTR support across entire application

recommendations.description: Create documentation on the approach for bidirectional text support migration
recommendations.benefit: Guide future development and ensure consistency

recommendations.recommendation: Verify font rendering in RTL context
recommendations.description: Test new fonts (Plus Jakarta Sans, Noto Sans Hebrew, Fira Code) in both LTR and RTL modes
recommendations.benefit: Ensure typography quality for international users

recommendations.description: Consider if absolute positioning pattern used for background decoration can be replaced with modern CSS approaches
recommendations.benefit: Reduce layout complexity and improve maintainability
